page.title: 16LAW & ORDER IN DUNS
page.content: WE FOUND THAT THE PERCENTAGE OF CRIME IN DUNS IS DOWN FROM LAST YEAR . THE MAIN CRIME IN DUNS HAS BEEN THEFT AND VANDALISM.WHEN SOMEONE IS CAUGHT THEY USUALLY GO TO COURT BUT IF THEY ARE UNDER THE AGE OF 16 THEY WOULD GET LET OFF WITH AN OFFICIAL POLICE WARNING .THERE HAVE BEEN TWO MURDERS ONE WAS IN {NEWTOWN STREET} IN {1976 }AND THE OTHER WAS AT{CHEEKLAW } IN {1965}OR{1967 .}THERE WAS ONE MAN CAUGHT FOR EACH OF THE MURDERS AND THEY WERE SENT TO PRISON FOR LIFE.THE SHERIFF COURT MEETS ON WEDNESDAY EVERY WEEK EXCEPT DURING THE HOLIDAYS, AND THE DISTRICT COURT MEETS EVERY MONTH. THE SOURCE OF OUR INFORMATION WAS INSPECTOR ANGUS OF DUNS.
